To Whom It May Concern: 
 
 I am notifying you on behalf of iNET Interactive, owner of
HotScripts.com, EV1Servers.net  is hosting a rip of our site
HotScripts.com. Content has continually been stolen and our entire
site's structure and resources have been copied verbatim. The offending
material can be viewed at http://hotscripts.topdownloads.net/ 
 
 Attached is our formal DMCA notice.
